message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is too low for me. I can do $11,500, but that's my absolute bottom line.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,750. That's the best I can do.
